sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LFArtifactProcessorSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Default artifact processor script which all the artifact processors extend</description>
        <name>LFArtifactProcessorSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LFArtifactProcessorSNC = Class.create();
LFArtifactProcessorSNC.prototype = {
    __identifier: "LFArtifactProcessorSNC",

    initialize: function() {
        this.publishMode = null;
        this.updateSetSuffix = null;
        this.updateSetManager = null;
    },

    getTranslatableContent: function(params) {},

    saveTranslatedContent: function(documentContentObject) {
        // default save script to save translations into standard tables
        new LFReadSaveScriptUtils(this.publishMode, this.updateSetSuffix).saveTranslationsInStandardTables(documentContentObject);
    },

    initializeUpdateSetManager: function(publishMode, updateSetSuffix) {
        this.publishMode = publishMode;
        this.updateSetSuffix = updateSetSuffix;
        if (publishMode) {
            this.updateSetManager = new LFUpdateSetManager(publishMode, updateSetSuffix);
        }
    },

    switchToUpdateSetInScope: function(scope) {
        return this.updateSetManager ? this.updateSetManager.switchToUpdateSetInScope(scope) : null;
    },

    switchToPreviousUpdateSet: function() {
        return this.updateSetManager ? this.updateSetManager.switchToPreviousUpdateSet() : null;
    },

    type: 'LFArtifactProcessorSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-11 12:28:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>670060310fc03010c0774ee7c8767e20</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LFArtifactProcessorSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Localization Framework" source="com.glide.localization_framework">a4dd193447720210cd4e1ce4316d4312</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_670060310fc03010c0774ee7c8767e20</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-06-16 12:49:52</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
